welcomeDesc: Online courses And Mock Test Platform.
iAccept: I accept the term and privacy policy
weTexted: we texted you a code to verify your phone number.
aboutUsText: At Clarity Financial Training Ltd we offer professionally delivered CeMAP - The Certificate in Mortgage advice and Practice and CeRER - The Certificate in Regulated Equity Release Training Courses. Clarity FT is a LIBF Accredited Learning Support Provider, meaning our materials and mocks are verified by the awarding body once a year. We are committed to helping our students pass their exams with confidence. We have developed a range of practise mock questions structured in the same way your multiple choice exams will be tested. We have over 1,000 questions and answers to help you prepare for your exams. Each exam will test you under the same conditions as your LIBF exam and give you the answer at the end if you get the question wrong. Try our FREE CeMAP Mock and Free CeRER Mock taster questions to see how the mocks work, you will not be disappointed. You can buy one set of mocks or purchase the package. Get 3 months access and have the option to renew at the end. Good luck and happy learning.
contactUsText: We want to hear from you!!
furtherInformation: For further information or to make an enquiry please send us a message!
youCanEmail: You can email us directly by using the contact form on this page.
pleaseRead: Please read the following Terms and Conditions in order to avoid any misunderstanding. Applicants must read the T&C’s before they enrol. Clarity Financial Training Ltd will take no responsibility for failing to do so.
